price: Enti Yεpari sͻͻ ͻne nedͻm no mu, na Yεde wͻn guu ͻpo mu; na ͻyε obi a ͻfata soboͻ.
arabic: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhnāhu wajunūdahu fanabadhnāhum fī al-yami wahuwa mulīmun
